name: Ecora Resources plc Ordinary Shares
longDescription: Ecora Resources PLC is engaged in obtaining royalties from a diversified portfolio focusing primarily on base metals and bulk materials. It focuses on commodities such as Copper; Nickel; Iron Ore; Gold; Cobalt; Vanadium; Met Coal and Uranium. Some of its assets include Voisey's Bay; Mantos Blancos; Maracas Menchen and others.
